original_text: For Moses had said, Consecrate yourselves today to the Lord, even every man upon his son, and upon his brother; that he may bestow upon you a blessing this day.
korean_text: 모세가 이르되 각 사람이 자기의 아들과 자기의 형제를 쳤으니 오늘 여호와께 헌신하게 되었느니라 그가 오늘 너희에게 복을 내리시리라

sentences.original_text: Consecrate yourselves today to the Lord,
even every man upon his son,
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 각 사람이 자기 아들을 위하여

sentences.original_text: that he may bestow upon you a blessing this day.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희에게 오늘 복을 주시게 하려 함이라.
